prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that embodies a knight with a sword and shield.
Show me a steel-type Pokemon that has a regal appearance and mystical powers.
Imagine a Pokemon that can switch between offense and defense with a unique form.
Generate a Pokemon inspired by medieval knights, featuring a shiny sword and armor.
Design a dual-type Pokemon that combines ghostly elements with a metallic sheen.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a sword and shield, with elegant and sharp features.
Give me a Pokemon that has both offensive and defensive capabilities in battle.
